equipment.name: Office Desk
equipment.description: Required for an employee to do any work. Without desks, employees will be upset.

equipment.name: Snack Machine
equipment.description: Provides basic food for employees. Without food, employees will be hungry and tired.

equipment.name: Soda Machine
equipment.description: Provides basic drinks for employees. Reduces health but also reduces the need for sleep.

equipment.name: Water Fountain
equipment.description: Provides a basic drink for employees. Increases health.

equipment.name: Trash Bin
equipment.description: Provides for a place to throw away trash. Don't let your employees get dirty!

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Employees need to keep up on their skills, and a library is a good place to do it.
